abstract: Fairholme Capital Management gave shares of the bond insurer MBIA and the bailed-out insurer American International Group a boost on Tuesday after the investment firm run by Bruce Berkowitz disclosed new stakes in the companies.
snippet: Fairholme Capital Management gave shares of the bond insurer MBIA and the bailed-out insurer American International Group a boost on Tuesday after the investment firm run by Bruce Berkowitz disclosed new stakes in the companies.
lead_paragraph: Fairholme Capital Management gave shares of the bond insurer MBIA and the bailed-out insurer American International Group a boost on Tuesday after the investment firm run by Bruce Berkowitz disclosed new stakes in the companies.

headline.main: Fairholme Ups Stake in MBIA and A.I.G.
